V1 Cutline and Post‑V1 Backlog — Wave 12
W12-EP00-T001 — Inventory required access + secrets (Richpanel API key, Shopify access) and define secret storage plan
W12-EP00-T002 — Verify Richpanel tenant automation capabilities needed for middleware trigger (deferred Wave 03 items)
W12-EP00-T003 — Sample order linkage reality in tenant (Richpanel order endpoints) without storing PII
W12-EP00-T004 — Finalize webhook authentication approach and rotation strategy (based on tenant verification)
W12-EP01-T010 — Set up AWS Organization and create dev/staging/prod accounts (Organizations-only)
W12-EP01-T011 — Create IAM roles and least-privilege policies for middleware (ingress vs worker) and CI deploy
W12-EP01-T012 — Enable baseline logging + audit (CloudTrail, CloudWatch log retention, budgets, alarms)
W12-EP01-T013 — Create Secrets Manager + SSM parameter namespaces for env config (including kill switch flags)
W12-EP02-T020 — Select IaC tool and scaffold infrastructure repo modules (serverless stack)
W12-EP02-T021 — Create CI pipeline with quality gates (unit tests, schema validation, lint, security checks)
W12-EP02-T022 — Implement deployment promotion flow (dev → staging → prod) and rollback automation
W12-EP03-T030 — Implement API Gateway + ingress Lambda (fast ACK, validation, enqueue)
W12-EP03-T031 — Provision SQS FIFO + DLQ and internal message schema (conversation-ordered processing)
W12-EP03-T032 — Create DynamoDB tables for idempotency + minimal conversation state with TTL
W12-EP03-T033 — Implement worker Lambda skeleton (dequeue, fetch context, decision pipeline placeholder, action stub)
W12-EP03-T034 — Implement runtime feature flags (safe_mode, automation_enabled, per-template toggles) with caching
W12-EP03-T035 — Implement observability event logging + correlation IDs (ingress and worker)
W12-EP03-T036 — Implement vendor retry/backoff utilities and concurrency bounds (prevent rate-limit storms)
W12-EP04-T040 — Create Richpanel team + tags (Chargebacks/Disputes, mw-routing-applied, feedback tags) and document mapping
W12-EP04-T041 — Configure Richpanel automation to trigger middleware on inbound customer messages (avoid loops)
W12-EP04-T042 — Implement Richpanel API client with retries, pagination, and rate-limit handling
W12-EP04-T043 — Implement action executor (route/tag/assign/reply) with action-level idempotency keys
W12-EP04-T044 — Build integration test harness for Richpanel actions (staging recommended)
W12-EP05-T050 — Implement deterministic order linkage lookup using Richpanel order endpoints
W12-EP05-T051 — Map order details into template variables and handle common edge cases (multiple fulfillments)
W12-EP05-T052 — Implement Shopify Admin API fallback (only if required and credentials exist)
W12-EP05-T053 — Define and implement order-status-related routing rules (DNR, missing items, refund requests)
W12-EP06-T060 — Implement classifier model call with strict schema validation (mw_decision_v1) and fail-closed fallback
W12-EP06-T061 — Implement policy engine (Tier 0 overrides, Tier 2 eligibility, Tier 3 disabled) as authoritative layer
W12-EP06-T062 — Implement Tier 2 verifier call (mw_tier2_verifier_v1) and integrate into policy gating
W12-EP06-T063 — Implement confidence threshold configuration + calibration workflow hooks
W12-EP06-T064 — Integrate offline eval harness into CI (golden set run + regression gates)
W12-EP07-T070 — Implement template renderer (YAML templates + brand constants) with safe placeholder handling
W12-EP07-T071 — Enforce template catalog: allowed template_ids, per-channel enablement, per-template feature flags
W12-EP07-T072 — Implement Tier 1 safe-assist automation playbooks (DNR, missing items intake, refunds intake) + routing tags
W12-EP07-T073 — Implement Tier 2 verified order status auto-reply (tracking link/number) with deterministic match + verifier approval
W12-EP07-T074 — Enforce controlled auto-close policy (whitelist + audit)
W12-EP07-T075 — Create Richpanel 'AUTO:' macros aligned to template IDs (ops task) and document governance
W12-EP08-T080 — Implement webhook authentication in ingress (header token preferred) + request schema validation
W12-EP08-T081 — Implement PII redaction enforcement + tests (logs, traces, eval artifacts)
W12-EP08-T082 — Deploy dashboards + alarms (Wave 06/07/08 alignment) and validate alert runbooks
W12-EP08-T083 — Harden public endpoint (API Gateway throttling, optional WAF, SSRF/egress controls)
W12-EP08-T084 — Implement secret rotation support (multi-token validation) + document operational steps
W12-EP08-T085 — Operationalize IAM access reviews and break-glass workflow (alerts + cadence)
W12-EP09-T090 — Implement and run smoke test pack in staging (routing + Tier1 + Tier2 + Tier0 + kill switch)
W12-EP09-T091 — Run load/soak tests and validate backlog catch-up behavior without vendor storms
W12-EP09-T092 — Execute first production deploy runbook (routing-only) and verify observability + rollback
W12-EP09-T093 — Progressive enablement: enable Tier 1 templates first, then Tier 2 order status after verification
W12-EP09-T094 — Establish post-launch governance cadence (weekly review, monthly calibration) and close the loop with agent feedback tags
